name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
I am not criticizing this friend. Actually, whenever we discuss the fate of cats and dogs, I always see some people accusing these people of not speaking up for others.
This is my answer to these people.

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Foxconn is under investigation.
On October 22, the media reported that multiple departments have recently conducted tax audits and land use investigations on Foxconn's companies across the country in accordance with the law.
Previously, Terry Gou said that pressure from the mainland would not pose a threat to his campaign for Taiwan's president in 2024.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Influenced by the recent nationwide mass slaughter of cats and dogs, netizens who had previously registered for organ donation have begun to go to the Chinese Human Organ Donation website to cancel their previous registrations to express their protest and disappointment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 22, the official Douyin account of the Iranian Embassy in China released a video claiming that Israel bombed Palestinian children who were fetching water. It has attracted nearly 170,000 likes and a large number of condemnations from the Chinese people.
In fact, the video was a video of the Sudanese military attacking mercenaries on October 12.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At present, this student surnamed Li is still pretending to be an international student in Israel and accepting an interview with Phoenix TV, expressing sympathy for the Palestinians in tears. However, she did not mention her sympathy for the Chinese compatriots who died in the attack.
It is reported that she also asked some international students who were unwilling to shoot videos for her to give false testimony and admit that the chat content of the fake video she asked someone to shoot was forged by the international students themselves, otherwise she would have to go through legal procedures, which led to the international students seeking help in the circle of friends

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 22, in Xinyang, Henan, it was revealed online that law enforcement officers were photographed stealing sorghum with people by drones. The local authorities responded that they were investigating.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: While the nationwide campaign to slaughter cats and dogs was underway, some communities also decided through democratic voting whether stray animals should stay or go, and how to humanely care for and deal with them. Facts have proven that the management of stray animals is not a poor one, but a one-size-fits-all approach is pure lazy governance.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The town government responded that the government staff were trying to stop the people from pinching the ears of corn and the police had intervened.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of October 22, in order to prevent students from bringing electronic products into the campus, the No. 1 Middle School in Xinfeng County, Shaoguan, Guangdong, required all students returning to school on weekends to line up to pass through the security gate.
Because as long as the security gate rings, a thorough search will be conducted, resulting in extremely slow security checks.
Thousands of students were still crowded outside the school in the middle of the night waiting to be checked.
